name: Daily Bollinger-RSI Mean Reverter
description: Mean-reversion strategy for U.S. mid-cap equities using daily data. Long when price closes below the 20-day lower Bollinger Band and RSI(14) < 30; short when price closes above the upper band and RSI(14) > 70. Positions exit when price returns to the 20-day SMA or RSI reverts to 50. Risk capped with 1.5×ATR(14) stop and 2 % fixed-fraction capital allocation per trade.
